channel.title: Tropical Tree Deletion [417] {Deltascape bace}
channel.description:
ok. heres my problem. im building my donatorzone on an island (not evil bob's island) and it has Tropical trees, i have deletethatobject codes for around 100 of them the problem is, it only deletes the tree at Height level 1 rather than the whole item.
Is there a code to delete either, the rest of the height levels? or simply eradicate the item completely from the server?
Thanks
Msn: jaiden-watling@hotmail.com pics:
[IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz336/watlingj/1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz336/watlingj/2.png[/img]
bump

item.title: Tropical Tree Deletion [417] {Deltascape bace}
item.dc:creator: @watlingj watlingj
item.description:
@watlingj wrote:

Thanks to everyone who replied, i don’t suppose you could help me re-code my deletethatobjects? im not as good at java as i would like to be… im kinda learning as i go… lol, ill add my client.java if its required?

Read full topic

item.title: Tropical Tree Deletion [417] {Deltascape bace}
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

Spades:

I’ve come across this problem in the past. You should try to re-write the code and make it delete the object on all height levels.

Or just add a height integer to the method.

Because deleting all objects on all height levels could fuck something up when editing something inside of a building will multiple stories

Read full topic

item.title: Tropical Tree Deletion [417] {Deltascape bace}
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:4, topic:370956”]Search for the following:

public void Deleteobjects() {

You might see a few other lines there deleting other object’s already. Just create another line and fill in this:

deletethatobject(X, Y);

The X, Y are coordinates.[/quote]

I think he means that he wants to delete an object on a different height level.

Read full topic

item.title: Tropical Tree Deletion [417] {Deltascape bace}
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Search for the following:

public void Deleteobjects() {

You might see a few other lines there deleting other object’s already. Just create another line and fill in this:

deletethatobject(X, Y);

The X, Y are coordinates.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Spades wrote:

Deleteglobalobject or something like that in client.java, search around for it in there, I am sure you will find it.

I’m not sure about delta, But there should be a height integer in the deleteglobalobject method or whatever it is called.
